revised_title: On the Partitions of R-Pyramids: The First Class of R-gonous X-edra
tldr: The author investigates the partitions of an r-pyramid, focusing on the first class of r-gonous x-edra, and provides a method for determining the number of different r-gonous (r+K+1)-acral (r+k+1)-edra that can be made by partitioning the base and vertex of the r-pyramid.
